alert.note: Alert for Elkhead and Park Mountains (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 28 at 4:58PM MST until January 30 at 5:00PM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM SUNDAY TO 5 PM MST MONDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 10 to 20 inches with locally higher amounts up to 2 feet. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph above 10000 feet. * WHERE...Elkhead and Park Mountains. * WHEN...From 5 AM Sunday to 5 PM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult to impossible. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
